# solareclipser

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

`solareclipser` is an R package for [SOLAR-Eclipse](https://www.nitrc.org/projects/se_linux/).

## Installation

### solareclipser

```{r installation, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("txbrain-org/solareclipser")
```
